title: Enhancing Hospitality Practice Competencies: Flipped Learning to Reduce English Speaking Anxiety for Science Field Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced English reading comprehension, basic grammar knowledge, and understanding of scientific terminology
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners reduce their English speaking anxiety index by over 30% through flipped learning over 12 weeks
Learners can fluently and accurately deliver impromptu presentations on science topics for over 3 minutes
Learners improve speaking performance by 15% weekly based on peer feedback

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
